pages.text: As there are different types of materials, there are different types of Thaumagrals.$(br)Each one has a bonus in either the casting efficiency (the magan cost for spells) or cooldown reduction.
The Wooden Thaumagral is quite cheap, compared to others of its kind. Its spells are cheaper, too, but it has a higher cooldown. It also comes with wooden durability.
The Stone Thaumagral grants the same benefits as the Wooden Thaumagral; however, they are not as amplified.$(br)This one comes with stone durability.
The Golden Thaumagral casts spells at at higher magan cost; however, the spells can be cast faster.$(br)It also has a poor durability.
The Diamond Thaumagral has a slight boost on casting efficiency, such as a slight cooldown reduction.
